column3: “When I saw Purple Diesel in the collective I about jumped for joy. Sour D being one of my favorite strains I knew that whatever the Purple cross was I would enjoy it. The buds were very fluffy and dark purple (There was almost no green on these buds) with long dark orange hairs. The smell? Heaven? It actually smelled quite like diesely berries.. But It was heavenly nonetheless! The high was perfect. Very heady and ha...”

“While smoking this product, I was beyond high dude. I was literally inches away from Christ himself lol. But yeah this weed is cool it helps me focus to beat video game high scores and stuff. I HIGHLY recommend it guys.”

“Hey, I'm a medical grower out of Northern California. I've grown two different PurpleDiesel strains over the years and my second strain has been my favorite. Both strains genetically turn purple even with <70 degree temps. The fan leaves on both strains also turned orange-red-purple-black hued. normally a mix with a major black/purple tip to stem. (I'm on my third rotation of the second strain right now) The flowerin...”

“Vaped with a Pax.

Good results with both light and medium temperatures.  On light temp:  light head buzz, slight pain relief and tingles.  On medium:  nice head buzz, spacey and glassy cerebral high, decent body buzz.  Will not couch lock you unless you let it.

This can be considered a good wake 'n bake and a good afternoon strain.  Responds well to repetitive tasks and makes them enjoyable.  A good weekday strain ...”

“One of my favorite strains, and one of the few I can enjoyably smoke throughout the day. Very clear, creative high that propagates conversation, and socializing in general. Looks very much like you think Purple Haze x Sour Diesel would, and the same can be said of the scent. 9/10, highly recommended for anyone suffering from Social Anxiety.”

“pretty damn tasty and really stoney on the diesel side but giggly with the pre-98, relaxing and good for any time of day for me, it's a toss up between this and lucid dream for me though they're both really great.”
“Very uplifting and giggle but relaxing at the same time. Smoked about an 1/8th of it for 420. Amazing strain.”
“Super head high. Among one of the best Sativas I've had. Comparable to a Lambs Bread High. Not a pretty looker, but a great feel and price.”
“Super head high. Among one of the best Sativas I've had. Comparable to a Lambs Bread High. Not a pretty looker, but a great feel and price.”

“I've had some spiritual trips on this and I will do anything to get my hand on this again! Definitely a great trip from the start, very strong and tastes pretty good. If you're looking for a happy high with some spiritual/creative joy-this is it!”

“The same day I got my Red Card I was turned onto Purple Diesel because I was browsing a local medical dispensary and noticed it right away because of it's big nicely grown buds. I didn't even have time to research the strain, I was immediately hooked!!! Great for my MS fatigue, picks me up, and lets me go on with my day.”

“Okay, first time review here, but long(ish) time user. I used my vape for about an hour and I'm feeling content. I know some of you might think content is average, but those of you that know what i mean should try this strand if your just trying to stop thinking and relax.

I have ADHD and PTSD and both are being covered by this strain. I am highly impressed with how, just content, it makes me feel.  If you're lookin...”

“Overall rating 6.5

Appearance: Quite nice. Trichromes present, but not very large and they sparkle dull. Not a strong odor. a hint of sour perhaps the  Dense nug weighed out at 3.7g.

The batch I received from a local dispensary wasn't grown with too much care so... 

There's that. There's a bit of sour citrus in the flavor, yet the diesel comes through too. 

The high hit me BAM right behind the right eye a...”

“Good stuff. I use this before playing basketball - taking about 3 medium draws on a pipe, then heading off to the gym. It helps me play a much better game. I'm so much more focused and have noticed: 1) higher ability to anticipate plays of the offense and defense 2) jump shot is more on the money" 3) I play harder
column4: less likely to get lazy on a given play. Another nice thing is that even though I'm playing very compe...”"

column3: “It's a decent hybrid, very similar to Blue Dream, The main difference is that the Blueberry in Blue Dream lends a happy, goofy feeling whereas the Purple in Purple Diesel is more relaxing. And, like Blue Dream, it's mellow... maybe it's just me, but neither strain gets me really stoned, and they both make me sleepy if I over-smoke.”

“Purple Diesel has a spicy kick in the back of the tongue. It gets my wife an I aroused in a big way. We love having sex on the Purple D. Time warp is big for me as well. We watch crazy movie's like Kung Pow - Enter the Fist on Purple D and they are awesome. 

The head high is nice but not as smooth as other strains like sour diesel. The euphoria is average. When it's available I buy some to have in my stock. As I t...”

“There's not that much smoke and bad odor which I love because I'm a girly girl. I feel happy like a handsome man just walked in the room and he's hilarious. I keep laughing and shit. Ok I love this strain obviii and you will too, bye. 

It smells really fruity but a mild type of fruity smell. The taste of it is like...earthy or grainy in a way. Overall, I LOVE this weed! Makes you feel...

-me and my pothead girl...”

“It's a decent hybrid, very similar to Blue Dream, The main difference is that the Blueberry in Blue Dream lends a happy, goofy feeling whereas the Purple in Purple Diesel is more relaxing. And, like Blue Dream, it's mellow... maybe it's just me, but neither strain gets me really stoned, and they both make me sleepy if I over-smoke.”

“Purple Diesel has a spicy kick in the back of the tongue. It gets my wife an I aroused in a big way. We love having sex on the Purple D. Time warp is big for me as well. We watch crazy movie's like Kung Pow - Enter the Fist on Purple D and they are awesome. 

The head high is nice but not as smooth as other strains like sour diesel. The euphoria is average. When it's available I buy some to have in my stock. As I t...”

“i love this kind of purp, left my mind very wondering and i felt in a different world, on this u will find it easier to think out difficult situations and things, id recommend if you are having a stressful time planning or are just trying to make somthing easier. this is definitely a sativa just because u get back up after sitting down go to the lake and try this out, garuntee u'll have a great day.”

“Good stuff. I use this before playing basketball - taking about 3 medium draws on a pipe, then heading off to the gym. It helps me play a much better game. I'm so much more focused and have noticed: 1) higher ability to anticipate plays of the offense and defense 2) jump shot is more on the money" 3) I play harder
column4: less likely to get lazy on a given play. Another nice thing is that even though I'm playing very compe...”"

column3: “I love the sweet and spicy flavor of this strain. The high has the perfect balance of a short-lived head high and a long-lasting body buzz. The transition is sooo smooth from one state to the other that PD is my any-time-of-day bud!”

“Love this strain.  Energizing...You feel motivated to get things done even though you are blitzed.  You'll actually have fun doing mundane chores.  You feel light on your feet as you float through the day.  Powerful...I would not want to drive at the moment..  You can't stop smiling and everything seems hilarious...Fosters creativity.  What's not to like?...I'll be buying it again.”

“This one. 
Maaaan! (⊙_⊙)
This one waits 'til you've paused smoking and you look up and the whole room moves. 
You'll be like: I'm fine! 
Then you stand up, or try to do something and you realize just how high you are. 
Total creeper. 
If you're a new smoker, smoke a bowl and then do literally anything; like go to the bathroom, get a glass of water. Do something that makes you move. Doing that will help paint out how ...”
“One of my favorites, and comparable to Sour Diesel in terms of energy, creativity and happiness. Makes me want to get up and be productive. Zero couch lock, to boot!”

“The best way to sum it up, it's like war going on in your body...

The purple side gives you an incredible body high.

The Diesel side is trying to make you cerebral and euphoric.

The winner is the purple side and all you're left with battlefield of highness all over your body.

Excellent stuff!”

“This is a good pain reliever. Before I get out of bed in the morning, I am usually experiencing pain at 6+ and wonderously after 2 pulls from my vaporizer and about 10 minutes my pain level is down to about a 2-3.  This is a strain that also provides some energy.  The effects last about 3-4 hours.  This is a thoughtful strain and it can go both ways, if I am not paying attention to the task at hand I could easily get...”
“I really enjoyed purple diesel, the buds were Beautiful top notch quality.”

“Was able to get my hands on some of this recently.  All in all, this is great for daytime use.  It will relax you, but not make you tired or lazy.  If you take a stronger dose, you'll get a rather nice euphoria out of it, along with decent pain relief.  Lower doses will give you a degree of pain relief, but no euphoria.  My fibromyalgia pain dropped a good almost 2 points after vaping this.  This helped ease my nause...”

“I smoked this great flower then went to see a movie with my friends. This was absolutely perfect for the occasion. Just sat back and enjoyed the movie...in every sense. I was very focused on the story but we were also making comments throughout. Very happy, social and focused. I am quite pleased and I would definitely recommend. Best for day time use.”
“Damn that's pretty dank”

“i really really like this strain. I really like the come down. Its VERY clean and light and i felt stress free and anxiety free and kinda in a good mood. The high itself its sweet not to heavy but relaxing . good for movies and light video games. doesn't completely take pain. but just something i need if i want to relax but not be knocked out. Great for my anxiety.”

“Love The Start to Finish flavor of this Strain however mine was a 50/50 Hybrid coated to the core with crystals even the stems were completely covered in thick fuzzy crystals just dripping off these perfectly cured nuglets even after the buds are picked from them the stems would coat your fingers alone. Upon fist smoke of the true purple indica blended with true sour diesel sativa was like my favorite fruity pebbles ...”
“Purple Diesel is the best strain I have ever smoked!”

“I smoked this great flower then went to see a movie with my friends. This was absolutely perfect for the occasion. Just sat back and enjoyed the movie...in every sense. Great for my anxiety.”

“It's great the high is great the taste is phenomenal it's a beautiful flower 🍇”
“Great strain my personal favorite. Thank you Emerald Fields, Manitou, Colorado. Good smooth burn. Great for a day smoke can still be around a crowd. Nice gaming smoke also 😎😍👍😋😋”

“Man I love this shit. New patient, THC makes me paranoid, started with Grandaddy Purple, love it but after five or six hits Im asslocked. So I went for an amazing batch of this strain and wow.. no paranoia no heart racing very clear headed, time bending high. This is my new go to strain, especially because it releives all my back pain and relaxes my muscles preventing back spasms.”

“Really good strain for day time, flavorful, hits the throat a bit like tobacco in bong rips( not too much, still enjoyable) and the high is very decent, although this writer only tried moderate doses so far.”

“The purple diesel i got smelled great. The flower itself was cured properly and had small indications of purple leaf. I feel quite uplifted and happy in only a way a sativa can make you. The pain relief is a nice addition to what are already great sativa qualities. I enjoy this plant and would reccomend it to other patients who love sativa.”
“Small amount is needed. A very focused high, creative, upper.”
“nice sativa enjoyed this strain. picked up in phoenix arizona at trumed.”

“It’s a very enjoyful time, you first feel very euphoric and happy with everything around you, then you start relaxing more and more  and feel very comfortable with the environments around you. You start being very social and it’s just a very fun experience compared to other highs I’ve had where it was just very paranoia filled and anxious.”

“Spaced out head space, almost a day dreamy feeling. Smells like skunk, grape, and a hint of nuttiness; very resinous and sticky to the touch: small grinders beware! A great strain to fight depression!”
“Evening bud for me. Good one to go sit on lake side. Very calming high. Can feel the sativa in it on occasion mostly indica.”

“Really good strain for day time, flavorful, hits the throat a bit like tobacco in bong rips( not too much, still enjoyable) and the high is very decent, although this writer only tried moderate doses so far.”
“Small amount is needed. A very focused high, creative, upper.”

“I really like this strain. I just recently had shoulder surgery and it definitely helps with the pain once it kicks in! The only thing is, that I have to concentrate on relaxing the effected shoulder due to the energy it gives me and the lack of pain i feel. Will be getting again!!! 😤”
“I would consider this more of a well balanced hybrid than a pure sativa. Low paranoia level left me functional and happy but perhaps a bit short lived.”
“Great zoney, body buzz. Feeling good and hungry after a blunt. Typical indica sweetness with a slight diesel zing. Must try for indica fans and diesel fans.”

“I'm a big fan of hybrids, being the happy medium of effects for me. Purple diesel is quick in its delivery, and is a great choice for daytime smoke. It puts me in a great mood, has a pungent, but pleasant aftertaste/smell to it. Very sticky buds, definitely a great strand for less cost than some of the other famous strains”

“I fully enjoy this Hybrid, maybe better than Sour Diesel? Takes about 10 minutes to settle in so slow down on the Vape until you feel the full effect. Mostly Sativa, in fact I don't recommend just before bed however, very functional during day or evening hours. My only criticism is that I found it a little harsh on the intake and makes me feel like I'm starving, and I don't eat junk food.”
“a real good medicine its uplifting takes away stress great for depression it also relieves pain I like it alot”
“a real good medicine its uplifting takes away stress great for depression it also relieves pain I like it alot”
“Lemon Drop 10mg good for on the go”
“very potent , much dank , great high.”
“Such nice bright purples and oranges this Purple Diesel gave me a nice uplifting head high! Great strain to wake n bake with!”
“Love the taste of this one. A bit too much on the sativa side for me.”
“Made me highly motivated and highly motivated. Good for day time use of you still need the relief but don't want to sit on the couch all morning. Good for pain, stress and anxiety, depression.”
“What a strain! I didn't think you could make Sour D better, but Purple D does. Long lasting, social and creative. Highly recommends and will buy more.”
“I would consider this more of a well balanced hybrid than a pure sativa. Low paranoia level left me functional and happy but perhaps a bit short lived.”

fairly anxious.  Definitely did not find it a pleasant night-time smoke.

Body high allowed me to eat a decent breakfast. Head high calmed me down & allowed me to enjoy early Sunday afternoon wit my family. Gave me energy too which really helped get my @$$ moving, it was great! I could see how having too much might slow ya dow...”

Any physical ailments you are experiencing (be it nausea, body pain, or headache) will melt away. Solved all my restlessness and insomnia and now I am ready to sleep for the evening. :) Beautiful strain. If it's legit, no matter where you are, you owe it to yourself to smoke some Purple D.”

Smooth smoke, good flavor, great smell!”
“Loved It!!”
“this shit is like mixing my 2 favorite strains together. sour D and purple kush. this tha bomb.”

“This really is a powerful strain in many ways.  Strong, sweet flowery fragrance from the buds which comes through in taste with a deep gas taste on exhale.  The full portrait is not given with a sniff from the jar alone because the exhale is where it is at.  Beautiful 1 dollar .5 prerolls for the Superbowl so awesome deal, but did not get to see the flower to note on appearance.  Mid teens as for percentage a very de...”
“this is the tits! quick happy buzz. high in the clouds :) relaxed body but active happy mind. great distresser. munchies n  cotton mouth r downside.”
“Taste of the Purple Diesel comes through very strongly while in oil form. Not very stable at room temp. Very smooth hit strong head high.”
“Purple in some buds nice trichomes got white haze”
“I've only smoked a few times, but this one stood out. Along with a fun night it's a light giggly high. Definitely my favorite atm <3”

“I love this strain for days when I have things to accomplish so getting stoned really isn't the best, but I need at least to take the edge off multiple symptoms. Purple Diesel will allow me to function and still enjoy a nice high.”

“this hybrid, if grown right should produce some very crystaly and dence nugs. well this flower isnt that bad, it has an awsome taste but dry and not very compact overall i probably wouldent get this strain if you are an avid marijuana enthusiast, for you wont get the well deserved satisfaction buzz.”
“Delicious taste. Super nice high. Made me feel active but relaxed: would totally smoke again.”
“Not very dense and burns very quickly. The high is great for anxiety and depression, but don't expect it to last very long”

“My friends/coworkers liked this one a lot so I tried it for myself. Unfortunately, Purple Diesel didn’t do much for me aside from making me very hungry.  It was a nice smoke with good flavor and it was absolutely beautiful.    It just didn’t offer me much more than that.”
“smells like yummy tropical berries, and flavor is less impressive.  Nice night time smoke.”

“This is a very awesome strain it helped allot with my anxiety, ADD, insomnia, and ocd. helped allot with focus to. Its very potent and for me seemed like a indica dominant strain but definitely had sativa effects to. the taste is phenomenal and is just as described on the page with a hint of citrus. Recreational wise Its a good strain to smoke with friends and go out and have fun on no matter what you are doing.”
“sativa high hits instantly but after bout thirty minutes its bubba Kush heritage really shows itself couchlockk!”

“I purchased a purple diesel widowmaker and was very dissapointed. Only had a few hits off it before I could no longer hit it. I had to cut the paper off and roll another much smaller joint. For 20.00 what a rip off. Dont waste your money!!!! I contacted the company who makes widowmaker there in arcata. All I got was a sorry, where did you purchase it. I told them THOH. That was the last ive heard anything. Buyer bewa...”
“It took me 45 minutes to write this because I had just vaped some Purple Diesel. I am solidly impressed.”
“Honestly the best high I've had in a while uplifting and energized”

“overall experiences where nice it was a very complicated strain though. i thought this strain would work well for insomnia  i soon found out i was wrong if anything i promoted insomnia. there was excessive hunger i wanted to move a lot yet i was focused. 

peace, love, happiness.”
“laughed my ass off and played volleyball in a parking lot at my high school. then passed the fuck out. 10/10 would recommend.”
“Overall pretty nice. Wasn't the most focused on it but good for relaxing after a day of homework.”
“Doesn’t seem to affect me much. But has a nice taste.”
“Very purple and very diesely! So diesely the aroma  burnt my nose a bit but it tastes grape and pleasant aftertaste.”
“my productivity heightens as I take flight. excellent strand. great app this is.”
“Great”

“Oh my was this lovely! The person who saved my wretched life created a strain by crossing purple diesel with blue dream and the result...purple diesel dream...was just that-dreamy! Light and smooth to smoke I felt all was right in the world if only briefly.”
“This strain was pretty good.Made me feel super relaxed and joyous  especially with all the college stress lately.”
“couches is what its all about”

“Initially, I was unimpressed by this strain. The flavor wasn’t what I expected and the buds were a bit dry. After getting halfway through a bowl, the effects began to kick, but it still wasn’t anything spectacular. About 10 minutes after I was done, the magic started. This is a “creeper” strain. The main thing I want to point out about this strain is that it’s great for putting the brakes on the depression train. I w...”

“Got seeds, lucky. First, one of my new favorites, has a clear headed high similar to 707 Headband, great for mental focus. Smell is berry big time, starts sativa ends indica. Got almost sleepy at tail end of the effect, but super alert at the start. 
So, about the seeds. One of the nugs I got had some and the rest were perfect. Grew at home and harvested. Real easy grow, too. Produces great and high quality with just...”
“Sweet and sour taste. Great for stress and I believe it is a hybrid, sativa dominant”
“Background sedative high”

“Excellent, made me find mundane shit really hilarious and great sense of energy. 
No negative thoughts or anxiety while still being cerebrally energetic.”
“Solid hybrid with a truly deep violet hue that is eye candy, for sure. Very balanced in mind and body effect, but tends to keep one focused and productive. recommended for daytime use”
“Nice strong meds. Great to feel that lilting body buzz again from the pre 98 parent.”

“Purple diesel get the job done, if you want a strong strain to relax without the couch lock this is for you, 4 bong hits and I'm mellowed out happy and chilling nice euphoric high.. I use it to destress after work, if smoked(or whatever method of consumption you desire) in larger quantities you'll experience some drowsyness but nothing too severe, its perfect if you have insomnia...”
“This is just a wonderful hybrid all around. Easy care, High Yields, Smell/Taste/Looks is top shelf with the patient grower.”
“one of my favorites... gives me a very happy-silly talkative kinda stone with equal amounts of head and body high. defiantly a day time strain.”

“one of my top strains, the look is a classic sour diesel but with a touch of grand daddy purp to it.  smell is amazing, very dense and heavy sour diesel smell with a touch of sweetness.  breaks up nice and smokes even better”
“Came straight from Cali and i knew i had to get me some. The main thing i love about this weed is its taste. It has a very candy taste but with a kick at the end.”
“This wax is pretty good! Tastes piney hits the throat a little rough my pen pulls hard. Just got done vapin and I feel gooood. Can't really go wrong with top shelf wax but still would get again.”

“A hybrid of Sour Diesel and Pre-98 Bubba Kush - two of the most opposite strains you can find that, when combined, elicit a very contrasting, befuddling high.

After smoking, my immediate reaction was Woah
column4: what a different come on!" Feels like the skin on your head's being pulled back along with your lower jaw. How weird!

column2: yet you're strangely still able to focus and express yoursel...”"

column3:
“Not my favorite hybrid but still enjoyed every smoke!! I am in a state cannibis is still illegal so I just get what I can. 😍 I have no negative things to write about this strain- I just have had even better hybrids before. 
Very focused and relaxing though- and also a 
VERY strong odor. Not a smell you can fan out the window. Smoke outside! 

Would buy again if offered it.”
“great taste and smell but a little lackluster on the potency.”
“Very strong great smell an taste perfect purp diesel mix. A must smoke for your top shelf connoisseur.”
“smells fuckin amazing tastes fucking amazing and the high eases into you then bow heaven for some good hours :)”
“good strain. long lasting high. very good high.”

“I'm starting to really enjoy Sativa leaning hybrids and Purple Sour D doesn't disappoint. I basically got to try the pants pure essence in a High Terpene Extract by Dabstract with a staggering 22% terps by mass. I'm loving it! Gotta get some pure THCa to dip it!”
“trying it for the 1st time in the BHANG" stick cartridge
column4: must say pretty nice high went to the gym on it had gr8 workout...... recommended!”"

column3: “im an everyday cannabis user using multiple different strains daily, and this one out of them all is my favorite. it is really the only strain that i cam actually feel it kicking in much stronger 45 minutes after smoking its crazy how noticeble the creep is because its all head high then BAM your whole body feels indescribable.”
“Good sativa with a woody flavor via vaping.   Definitely will perk you up with a nice head high.”

“I had a few rips of it the other day and I gotta say it has a great and pungent taste to it, and the high is VERY potent. Though it was potent, it didn't last as long as I wish it did. Pretty harsh, but flavorful. Most likely because it was outdoor, but I prefer outdoor anyway. For being a cross breed of gdp and (one of my top 5) Sour D, i was actually unsatisfied. I'd much rather have pure Sour D.”
“Nice strain. Breaks down nicely and tastes very good, though can be harsh sometimes. Definitely made me feel awake, content and giggly.”

“Great strain. Very relaxing, but not so much you feel couch locked.  A bit more body high than other sativas.
Makes every thing feel super awesome.  Makes touch senses are super high!  A very horny strain too.  :)”

“This is the first hybrid I've purchased after a heavy indica only period. It sure has brought back all my favorite effects of a sativa without the anxiety that it sometimes causes me. Definitely a nice way to end the night while starting on some homework! Gets those thoughts a moving yet still feeling very relaxed.”
“fun, creative but trippy paranoia”

“I give this more of a three and a half. The pungent smell throws me off a tad because the taste is so different. 
Still a decent buzz and I would recommend for moderate pain such as muscle soreness or menstrual cramping.”
“Oddly enough this strain made my anxiety, and depression worse. I had a hard time finding motivation to do anything even though I wasn't couchlocked. ODD FOR A SATIVA...”

“Molly at Karma Kush
Happy
No munchies
Short lasting”

“This has to be my favorite strain so far. I didnt get paranoid like i usually do and the taste was awesome . The buds are nice and big and sticky. I really like this strain and would like to get more. This strain is a must toke!”

“Looks: Beautiful light green buds with hints of purple. Smell: Like napame in the morning, complete fuel with a pleasent whiff of purple. Taste: Nice purple taste with hints of fuel/chemdawg flavor. Buzz Type: Mellow body buzz. Solid body high sure to make you smile.”
“Good for daytime users. Relaxing and helps with pain :)”

“Got seeds, lucky. First, one of my new favorites, has a clear headed high similar to 707 Headband, great for mental focus. Smell is berry big time, starts sativa ends indica. Got almost sleepy at tail end of the effect, but super alert at the start. 
So, about the seeds. One of the nugs I got had some and the rest were perfect. Grew at home and harvested. Real easy grow, too. Produces great and high quality with just...”
“It was one of the best I’ve had .. blew my mind when I saw purple buds .. ALL PURPPS A TODA MADRE.. left me lungless.. and stress free I was one with nature”
“I may be one of the few who thinks this strand is like an aphrodisiac. holy cow! it does work for my pain and mental disabilities though.”

“I was disappointed my guy had this and not one of my more known favorites (blue dream, Cindy 99) I needed something special to take away the stress of a wedding. One magical bowl later and life was grand again. This strain will lift you up and leave your mind buzzing and laser like focus on long term ambition but beware you will think such awesome majestic projects that you will be so excited to get going that you wi...”
“This is one of my favorites. I love the Diesel as is, but this one deserves it's name.  Great feeling high.”

“This really is a powerful strain in many ways.  Strong, sweet flowery fragrance from the buds which comes through in taste with a deep gas taste on exhale.  The full portrait is not given with a sniff from the jar alone because the exhale is where it is at.  Beautiful 1 dollar .5 prerolls for the Superbowl so awesome deal, but did not get to see the flower to note on appearance.  Mid teens as for percentage a very de...”
“I love this strain! It smells so good and taste great. Feeling of happiness rushes over you after a hit or two. Definitely a gooder”
“i really love the high, it’s very stress free & makes me giggly. i love the floral diesel taste & smell:)”

“the easiest smoke. a great strain for beginners and pro-stoners. easy going high, great for day time euphoria and naughty adventures just the same. could smoke it forever and be satisfied, such a well rounded high and an awesome very distinctive purple flavor”
“Acquired a couple grams of some Purple Diesel shatter, very stable relaxed high, with a potency similar to Durban Poison, long-lasting high”
“Gas Gas Gassss”

“Love it was kinda sketchy at first about it but man when I got to sit down and enjoy it was one best high I had in while kept me upbeat and on point really like the strain mix with my favorite (Purp) im all for it 💯🗣🤟🏾”

peace, love, happiness.”

“My friends/coworkers liked this one a lot so I tried it for myself. Unfortunately, Purple Diesel didn’t do much for me aside from making me very hungry.  It was a nice smoke with good flavor and it was absolutely beautiful.    It just didn’t offer me much more than that.”

“I love this strain for days when I have things to accomplish so getting stoned really isn't the best, but I need at least to take the edge off multiple symptoms. Purple Diesel will allow me to function and still enjoy a nice high.”

“Initially, I was unimpressed by this strain. The flavor wasn’t what I expected and the buds were a bit dry. After getting halfway through a bowl, the effects began to kick, but it still wasn’t anything spectacular. About 10 minutes after I was done, the magic started. This is a “creeper” strain. The main thing I want to point out about this strain is that it’s great for putting the brakes on the depression train. I w...”
“Doesn’t seem to affect me much. But has a nice taste.”

For 20.00 what a rip off. Dont waste your money!!!! I contacted the company who makes widowmaker there in arcata. All I got was a sorry, where did you purchase it. I told them THOH. “Not very dense and burns very quickly. The high is great for anxiety and depression, but don't expect it to last very long”

“This is the best bud I have ever laid my eyes one. It wasn't sweet, just very earthy. But damn, it was so purple. I always wanted to try purple buds 😍”
“It left me feeling awake and focused energized happy yet slightly euphoric took care of my pain my depression anxiety my nausea. I was able to function to my day helped with my mood change”
“Very nice heady buzz, makes you relax and focus but not sleepy, definitely one of my favorites, had it on wax form.”

“Not bad but not great, this sativa dominant hybrid looked nice with small clusters of trichomes layered over small, dark lavender hued buds which smelled like a dirty grape. Unfortunately, the taste was similarly bland and the effects weren't as strong and long lasting as I expected. I was told that this Purple Diesel that I bought was from Granddaddy Purple and NY Diesel, which is why my experience differs from othe...”

“I'm not a huge fan of Diesel, but I am a huge fan of anything Purple.  Tastes pretty good.  Dank as fuck, of course.  Got it for free which made it all the better.  Had a headache after the high.  Not a big deal though.  Smoking another gram or two once the headache occurs takes care of the problem.”

“Purple D is one of my favorite sativa-heavy strains of all time. Hits hard and is a great daytime smoke. Very cerebral and makes day-to-day very relaxing and stress-free.

Anytime I see Purple Diesel, I grab it. Fusion Medical Marijuana is currently doing $10/g on Purple D, I highly recommend grabbing some!”
“Best stuff I've had in awhile 👌👍 Very Good”

“Migraine pain 7; nausea 8-9 when I medicated round 1100 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Head high rescued me from the bad space I woke up in! :-) Body high allowed me to eat brunch @ bout 1300 or so. High lasted 3 hours which is great for an obvious Sativa dominant. I'd highly recommend for daytime use for pain/nausea/fatigue! :-)”

“I love this strain! Personal taste, but it makes me incredibly creative... Music wise, dance wise, the one I smoke has some real strong sativa genetics because as soon as it kicks in (takes some time) I am in full auto and ready to blow everyones minds! It gets me relaxed too and I use this a lot whenever I play Xbox. Good point for this one is... No couch-lock whatsoever... But beware, after a while whenever you sta...”
“I have the ill headband.”
“Purpley, grapey and delicious. On top of my sativa list. Made me want to jam for hours. Music sounded really spacey. Sativa fans give it a try.”
“This strain is the best I had a quarter today and was selling and smoking with a few people and I wasn't able to walk home”
“very very sticky with dense purple buds..felt more like and indica strain..great for after work and afternoon relaxation and stress”

“I tried a $10 gram of this and I was pretty impressed. Nice nug structure with dense buds that bounced back when squeezed. Mine was not purple in color but had a purple flavor to it. The effects took a little bit to kick in. I felt uplifted and was able to function without being tired. It definitely is good for stimulating appetite. It's a nice daytime strain to share with your friends.”

“On 3/7 I had spine surgery. This strain was a lifesaver! I couldn't eat to save my life. The pain meds left me feeling extremely nauseous. This not only gave me a healthy appetite, it also put a much needed smile on my face. It's permanently moved into my must have at all times" container.”"
“Great smell.  Buzz came in heady fast an then evolved into a mellow, happy, heavy eyed feel.  Made my throat itch a little an gave me dry mouth.”

“My favorite diesel by far from the pre 98 Bubba w/ deisel winnnning!
Provides that huge kick in morning like a grape red bull.Love this shiptz! Great day time strain or morning starter.I love this strain for Monsoon season for migraine pain relief.Pick it up for sure KOBE strain”
“super gasss”
“Good creeper strain. Mellow and relaxing. Good for daytime. Wasn't let down but it didn't knock my socks off.”

“Purple diesel get the job done, if you want a strong strain to relax without the couch lock this is for you, 4 bong hits and I'm mellowed out happy and chilling nice euphoric high.. “Oh my was this lovely! The person who saved my wretched life created a strain by crossing purple diesel with blue dream and the result...purple diesel dream...was just that-dreamy! Light and smooth to smoke I felt all was right in the world if only briefly.”

“Overall pretty nice. Wasn't the most focused on it but good for relaxing after a day of homework.”
“laughed my ass off and played volleyball in a parking lot at my high school. then passed the fuck out. 10/10 would recommend.”
“Honestly the best high I've had in a while uplifting and energized”
“It took me 45 minutes to write this because I had just vaped some Purple Diesel. I am solidly impressed.”
“sativa high hits instantly but after bout thirty minutes its bubba Kush heritage really shows itself couchlockk!”

“This is a very awesome strain it helped allot with my anxiety, ADD, insomnia, and ocd. helped allot with focus to. “this hybrid, if grown right should produce some very crystaly and dence nugs. well this flower isnt that bad, it has an awsome taste but dry and not very compact overall i probably wouldent get this strain if you are an avid marijuana enthusiast, for you wont get the well deserved satisfaction buzz.”
“I've only smoked a few times, but this one stood out. Along with a fun night it's a light giggly high. Definitely my favorite atm <3”
“Purple in some buds nice trichomes got white haze”
“Taste of the Purple Diesel comes through very strongly while in oil form. Not very stable at room temp. Very smooth hit strong head high.”
“this is the tits! quick happy buzz. high in the clouds :) relaxed body but active happy mind. great distresser. munchies n  cotton mouth r downside.”
“Loved It!!”

“I just love this strain since it's great daytime pain reliever!!!  THis one is essential to any connoisseur mm chest!
Smooth smoke, good flavor, great smell!”
“I reviewed this back in April and this new batch blows it away. Probably best for Pain, Anxiety, Insomnia for sure! It tastes amazing!”
“very chill and mellow high”
“Such a great strain for stress an just making you happy! Definitely a tie between this an blue dream for stress an anxiety!”

“This strain is fantastic, beyond fantastic in fact! Just smoked a half blunt of this with 2 other strains in it and the Purple D high way overpowered the other 2. I had been in a lousy mood all day, with none of the Sativias' I smoked all day lifting it at all. After smoking that blunt though I began to feel light, happy, and the mood I had been looking for all day finally graced me with it's presence. The high is ex...”
“I love this strain. Not only is it my first but it is also my favorite. I love purple diesel!”

“i really really like this strain. I really like the come down. Its VERY clean and light and i felt stress free and anxiety free and kinda in a good mood.  The high itself its sweet not to heavy but relaxing . good for movies and light video games.  doesn't completely take pain.  but just something i need if i want to relax but not be knocked out.  Great for my anxiety.”
“Great hybrids. Almost no come down. Great positive happy high”

“If you are a Diesel fan, you will be happy with this strain. I feel like the Diesel was more present than the Bubba but don't get me wrong, the Bubba is the first thing to kick in. Diesel comes with time and makes the effects better and better. I felt very relaxed, happy and uplifted. Really good to take the stress away and anxiety. No side effects at all. Had a glass of water and I was ready to enjoy the next hour. ...”

“Excellent strain, good for multipurpose.

Sativa-esque effects kick in near-instantaneously, and are a nice head buzz (behind the eyes) without being too overwhelming. 

T+10 mins: the more sedative effects begin to kick in. Stress all but evaporates. I feel calm, collected, and confident in general. 

T+15 mins: May as well be T+30 mins, judging from how I'm losing track of time. At this point, much more of the calm...”

“Best strain I've had so far. After about 10 minutes I already felt it coming on, and then, I was on a journey through a desert in Jurassic park, till I ended up asslocked in my friends neighbors house. I couldn't tell if time was moving quickly or slowly. I could control my senses and made it feel good down in my crotch it was heavenly. Would recommend to anyone.”
“amazing outdoor spring and summer harvest”
“This was really helpful for my anxiety. It makes me chatty and I still feel like I can function physically and mentally. This is one of my top three favorite strains.”
“I was impressed. Solid strain with a hypnotic aroma. Buzz really lasted. A must blaze!!!!”

“I had some of this last night. It was a really fun one to smoke. But recently I've heard that people shock their plants to do this...or things that stress them to grow this way and that that lowers the quality of the weed. I'm pretty sure I had some of that. I was stoked to smoke it, but it just wasn't even as crazy as regular Diesel. I really doubt it's cuz I smoked some other strain later, but it wasn't as good as ...”

“by far some of the best weed i have ever tasted. it's phenomenal absolutely amazing. taste is great, smell nice and strong deep aroma, and the high. well, the Diesel comes out true in this in effect as well as the purple effects over all great body high and great mind euphoric high :)”
“it good”
“smells like yummy tropical berries, and flavor is less impressive.  Nice night time smoke.”
“This strain seems to bring on a sense of being focused.”

“I loved it! It is a huge creeper and has an amazing high! ;)”
“Love this strain!!! Nice relaxed high that you can smoke on all day, but still get things done.”

“another creep strain that takes awhile to kick in but when it gets into effect it really takes a punch it hits you with realxed feelings it gets from the Pre-98 BK but u can really feel the sativaness of this strain as it keeps u focused and very euphoric”

“Good 4 metal alterness is necessary and depressive/pain relief properties it provides 😆”

“Great bud. Oh man, smoke this with a couple friends and felt amazing. Smelled just great, tasted even better. Right away started to feel great, than I just numb. Now the purple is coming back, and I can tell this is gonna be a great sleep. Awesome bud. Recomm...”
“takes awhile to kick in but once it does your in for a treat”
“This has a very different taste to it. Very enjoyable, smooth smoke, with almost immediate effects. Very pleasing body high with quite a bit of cerebral activity as well.”

“Not the purplest of the purple strains but it had it streaks of color..The leaves are all frosty and when you crack them open your blast with intense chronic smell.  It was grown by  Green Thumb Gradens and they always do a great job on there strains.. They grow for Have A Heart which is a sweet store and i would recommend it to any one..”
“This strain blew my fucking mind maaannnn”
“Nice strong meds. Great to feel that lilting body buzz again from the pre 98 parent.”

“One of my newer favorites, breaks up nicely, rolls good, burns good.
Even the smoke is smooth.
A must try for everyone!”
“tasty and very relaxing! love this strain”
“This strain has me and my husband giggling up a storm, joking about dildos and other ridiculous stuff. A+”
“Definitely creep weed.”
“Very potent Hybrid that lays true to it's Diesel origins.”
“Damn good”
“Couch locker but, still makes you feel energetic. Your happy to be stuck.”
“Wow, picked up a 1/4 of this last week and damn!  It about knocked me out, and my pain too!  Excellent strain if you want to completely relax.”
“Best looking buds I've seen. The amount of purple is amazing. Smells and tastes great: very fruity and definitely tastes purple". Great for daytime use.”"

“Pretty happy with this strain, it felt sort of a heavy high. I used this with another strain so I'm not too clear as to what specifically was causing what effects but this is defiantly a great strain.”
“I would have to give this bud a solid 7. I was kinda disappointed with this strain because the genetics it had. It gave a decent high but it didn't really last too long.”

“One of my favorite purples for daytime use and relief of anxiety. Good looking dark, dense, purple nuggs. Tastes and smells sweet and fuely. Long lasting uplifting high with just a pinch of couch lock.”
“Great Day Usage, slight anxiety when too much, but HIGHLY recommended”
“Another one of my most favorites! Smells similar to Sour D! I felt uplifted, happy, and relaxed!”

“This batch is by Deep Roots Harvest - testing info : 
27.30 %  
The buds are big & tasty 😋 Crystal covered goodness 😛👍🏼 Solid buds ! 

Good daytime or night. medicine .
I'm a huge Diesel fan ..... so I couldn't pass up trying this strain out . Definitely not disappointed!! 😊👍🏼
The Diesel isn't as strong as some diesels...”

“Love this taste. The strong taste and odor reminds me of old school weed. Definitely feel up while smoking this and my back pain is significantly reduced. I smoke concentrate only so right now its Bhoys Purple Diesel BHO Honey Oil”
“Pretty good strain for daytime and on the job. Happy, muscle relaxer and pain reliever. Energizing and smells very fruity :)”

“this is some fire for real. i been searching for sour diesel in my city this is the closest they had to it so i thought i try it. the aroma is fantastic. i had a spliting headache it went away in a matter of seconds. love this 1 a must try.”

“Solid strain. Very fruity.”
“Made me feel like I was floating.”
“Very good bud. I feel very relaxed and pretty happy.”
“I love it, smoking in atm and is filled with flavour”

“This is my favorite strain for social outings.  It doesn't take much for a long lasting happy, goofy, high. The munchies take a couple of hours to kick in, and the high lasts after eating for another good little while.”
“very nice”
“It takes a little while to kick in, but does result in a nice creative euphoria. Very strong sour taste.”

“Flavor is very good and the hot is very smooth however, the dry eyes were so bad one of the blood vessels in my eye swelled up and hurts like a mf. Would smoke again but the dry eyes for me is just to much”
“Very good somewhat clear high very strong was able to get up and go explore the woodz with mu friends enjoyed alot”

“I don't remember pain/nausea scale as I medicated with dis one yesterday. But pain/nausea/anxiety were a big issue & dis strain has always helped wit that. I did note dis one is a Satvia dominant cuz it woke me up like a wonderful cup of coffee! :-) I'd highly recommend dis strain & dis dispensary to anyone! You will not be dissappoin...”

“super strong smell before and after smoked. this loud strain will SERIOUSLY get you in trouble. very nice smooth intense high. very good functionable strain.”
“OMG this strain is amazing! Really fucking strong!”

“Friendly light buzz early on and lasting for a couple of hours. Felt it in the throat too, so wouldn't use this on a singing day.
